sections.heading: agreement, defined.Solar agreement shall mean a right, whether or not stated in the form of a restriction, easement, covenant, or condition, in any deed, will, or other instrument executed by any person for the purpose of insuring adequate access of a solar energy system to solar energy

sections.text:
66-909.Solar agreement, defined.

Solar agreement shall mean a right, whether or not stated in the form of a restriction, easement, covenant, or condition, in any deed, will, or other instrument executed by any person for the purpose of insuring adequate access of a solar energy system to solar energy.

SourceLaws 1979, LB 353, ยง 9;Laws 2012, LB828, ยง 5.
